nodes.bodyText: Can't we default these in the release template yml instead of duplicating everywhere?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,6 +3,9 @@ parameters:
   AdditionalModules: []
   SDKType: data
   ServiceDirectory: not-specified
+  TargetDocRepoOwner: 'Azure'

nodes.bodyText:
Unfortunately, I want this thing to properly pull arguments all the way in from the ci.yml. If I set default parameter in archtype-sdk-release, but still have the parameter passed INTO the release template from stages/archetype-sdk-*, it'll get defaulted to empty argument erroneously.
Now, there are arguments to be made for saying

well then just set the parameter when we actually need this behavior

But I feel like the way we have it set up now is the least amount of duplication when we actually start passing in different stuff from the ci.yml.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,6 +3,9 @@ parameters:
   AdditionalModules: []
   SDKType: data
   ServiceDirectory: not-specified
+  TargetDocRepoOwner: 'Azure'

@@ -143,12 +145,12 @@ stages:
 
   # The Prerelease and Release stages are conditioned on whether we are building a pull request and the branch.
   - ${{if and(ne(variables['Build.Reason'], 'PullRequest'), eq(variables['System.TeamProject'], 'internal'))}}:
-    - template: archetype-java-release.yml
+      - template: archetype-java-release.yml

nodes.bodyText: Definitely don't understand how this snuck in.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -143,12 +145,12 @@ stages:

   - ${{if and(ne(variables['Build.Reason'], 'PullRequest'), eq(variables['System.TeamProject'], 'internal'))}}:
